faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about creating your comfort video.

items.question: What if my video fails to generate?
items.answer: If your video fails to generate due to a technical issue, you will not lose any credits. We'll automatically refund your credits, and you can try again. Our support team is always here to help if you encounter any issues.

items.question: Will I lose credits if generation fails?
items.answer: No, you will not lose credits if a video generation fails. We have a robust error handling system that automatically detects failures and refunds your credits. You can then retry creating your video without any additional cost.

items.question: How does billing work?
items.answer: We offer flexible credit-based pricing. You purchase credits that can be used to generate comfort videos. Each video generation uses a certain number of credits based on the complexity and length of the video. Unused credits never expire, so you can use them whenever you need comfort.

items.question: Can I regenerate my video?
items.answer: Yes, you can regenerate your video if you're not satisfied with the result. Simply use the regenerate feature, and we'll create a new version for you. Each regeneration uses credits, but you have full control over when to regenerate.

items.question: How long does it take to generate a video?
items.answer: Typically, your comfort video will be ready within 2-5 minutes. The exact time depends on the complexity of your request and current system load. We'll notify you via email when your video is ready.

items.question: Can I customize the Bible verses used?
items.answer: Yes! While our AI intelligently selects verses based on your emotions, you can also specify particular Bible verses or themes you'd like to see in your video. We want to ensure the video speaks directly to your heart.
